snippet: The spokesman for Representative Nan Hayworth’s re-election campaign, Jay Townsend, had said, “Let’s hurl some acid” on female Democratic senators who took a certain stance.
abstract: Jay Townsend, a top campaign adviser to Republican Rep Nan Hayworth of New York, resigns over his earlier comment urging people to 'hurl some acid' at Democratic female lawmakers with whom he differed; Hayworth, who represents a district in New York City’s northern suburbs, is a top target of national Democrats in 2012 as both major parties are locked in a battle for control of the House.
lead_paragraph: The spokesman for Representative Nan Hayworth’s re-election campaign, Jay Townsend, had said, “Let’s hurl some acid” on female Democratic senators who took a certain stance.

headline.seo: Representative Hayworth’s Adviser Quits After Acid-Hurling Remark
headline.main: House Member’s Aide Who Wrote About Tossing Acid at Women Quits
